long_description: Buy a MiiR High 5 Diamond bike and you'll get more than a comfortable, reliable everyday riding bike, you'll also help MiiR give a bike to someone in need. With your purchase, MiiR will help a person in Africa or the U.S. to earn a bike through a work- or study-to-own program. The High 5 Diamond uses butted chromoly steel throughout the frame and fork to ensure a smooth, resilient ride. A Sturmey Archer 5-speed internally geared rear hub offers 5 different gears for your pedaling ease, plus easier maintenance compared to cassette and derailleur systems. Puncture-resistant tires roll smoothly. The MiiR High 5 Diamond bike has attachment points for fenders and a rear rack (fenders and rack sold separately). Includes a stainless steel water bottle and cage. Sizing: Small fits riders 5' 2" - 5' 7"; Medium fits riders 5' 7" - 5' 10"; Large fits riders 5' 10" - 6' 1"; XL fits riders 6' 1" - 6' 5"; size up if between sizes. What makes this bike different? Your purchase supports MiiR to empower one person in need with 2-wheeled transportation. US giving is targeted towards refugees, homeless, those getting out of prison, kids whose parents unable to afford a bicycle and other vulnerable populations. In Africa 70% of recipients are school children, the remaining 30% are aid workers, entrepreneurs and field mechanics.
